mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID userId, USER_NAME userName, TELEPHONE_NUMBE telephone, BIRTHDAY birthday, CURRENT_DATE currentDate, CHILD_MONTHS childMonths, MONTH_AGE monthAge, SEQ_NUM seqNum, KPI_TYPE kpiType, KPI_CODE kpiCode, KPI_DESC kpiDesc, SCORE score, IFNULL((select count(1) from (select DISTINCT month_age from v_user_kpi_d) a),0) pageCount FROM v_user_kpi_d where month_age=#{monthAge} order by monthAge
SELECT T.MONTH_AGE monthAge, T.KPI_TYPE kpiType, T.KPI_DESC kpiDesc, T.KPI_FLAG *T.SCORE AS score FROM child_health.DW_USER_KPI_F T WHERE T.USER_ID = #{userId} Order by T.MONTH_AGE, T.SEQ_NUM
